channel.title: Hugo on Hugo Profile
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Hugo Profile

item.title: Website Approach
item.description: Hugo To install Hugo on a local server, execute the command sudo apt hugo. After installation, confirm whether Hugo is installed by typing hugo server. Proceed by selecting a theme from the available Hugo themes. It is essential to thoroughly read and understand all instructions provided in the documentation. Following this,I created a Hugo site on the local server. Used Commands: hugo new site (type name of the site you want to creat) CD to root directory (into the site named file) then "CD" to themes cloned the git repository of the hugo theme (hugo profile) using [git clone url.
